questions.q_en: Who is known as the Father of the Indian Constitution?
questions.q_hi: भारतीय संविधान के जनक किसे कहा जाता है?
questions.solution: Dr. B. R. Ambedkar is known as the Father of the Indian Constitution.

questions.q_en: Which river is the longest in India?
questions.q_hi: भारत की सबसे लंबी नदी कौन सी है?
questions.solution: The Ganga is the longest river in India.

questions.q_en: What is the capital of Australia?
questions.q_hi: ऑस्ट्रेलिया की राजधानी क्या है?
questions.solution: Canberra is the capital city of Australia.

questions.q_en: Who was the first President of India?
questions.q_hi: भारत के प्रथम राष्ट्रपति कौन थे?
questions.solution: Dr. Rajendra Prasad was the first President of India.

questions.q_en: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
questions.q_hi: कौन सा ग्रह लाल ग्रह कहलाता है?
questions.solution: Mars is called the Red Planet due to its reddish appearance.

questions.q_en: Which vitamin is produced in the human body in sunlight?
questions.q_hi: सूर्य के प्रकाश से मानव शरीर में कौन सा विटामिन बनता है?
questions.solution: Vitamin D is produced in the human body in sunlight.

questions.q_en: Who wrote the National Anthem of India?
questions.q_hi: भारत का राष्ट्रगान किसने लिखा?
questions.solution: Rabindranath Tagore wrote the National Anthem of India.

questions.q_en: Which gas is most abundant in the Earth's atmosphere?
questions.q_hi: पृथ्वी के वायुमंडल में सबसे अधिक कौन सी गैस पाई जाती है?
questions.solution: Nitrogen is the most abundant gas in the Earth's atmosphere.

questions.q_en: Which country is known as the Land of Rising Sun?
questions.q_hi: उगते सूर्य की भूमि किस देश को कहा जाता है?
questions.solution: Japan is known as the Land of the Rising Sun.

questions.q_en: What is the currency of the United Kingdom?
questions.q_hi: यूनाइटेड किंगडम की मुद्रा क्या है?
questions.solution: The currency of the United Kingdom is Pound Sterling.

questions.q_en: Who invented the telephone?
questions.q_hi: टेलीफोन का आविष्कार किसने किया?
questions.solution: Alexander Graham Bell invented the telephone.

questions.q_en: Which is the smallest state of India by area?
questions.q_hi: क्षेत्रफल के अनुसार भारत का सबसे छोटा राज्य कौन सा है?
questions.solution: Goa is the smallest state of India by area.

questions.q_en: Which organ purifies blood in the human body?
questions.q_hi: मानव शरीर में रक्त को शुद्ध करने वाला अंग कौन सा है?
questions.solution: Kidneys purify blood in the human body.

questions.q_en: Who was the first woman Prime Minister of India?
questions.q_hi: भारत की पहली महिला प्रधानमंत्री कौन थीं?
questions.solution: Indira Gandhi was the first woman Prime Minister of India.

questions.q_en: Which metal is liquid at room temperature?
questions.q_hi: कमरे के तापमान पर कौन सी धातु द्रव होती है?
questions.solution: Mercury is liquid at room temperature.

questions.q_en: Which is the national animal of India?
questions.q_hi: भारत का राष्ट्रीय पशु कौन सा है?
questions.solution: Tiger is the national animal of India.

questions.q_en: Which ocean is the largest in the world?
questions.q_hi: विश्व का सबसे बड़ा महासागर कौन सा है?
questions.solution: The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean in the world.

questions.q_en: Who discovered gravity?
questions.q_hi: गुरुत्वाकर्षण की खोज किसने की?
questions.solution: Sir Isaac Newton discovered gravity.

questions.q_en: Which day is celebrated as World Environment Day?
questions.q_hi: विश्व पर्यावरण दिवस कब मनाया जाता है?
questions.solution: World Environment Day is celebrated on 5 June.

questions.q_en: Which is the highest mountain peak in the world?
questions.q_hi: विश्व की सबसे ऊँची पर्वत चोटी कौन सी है?
questions.solution: Mount Everest is the highest mountain peak in the world.
